sentences.en: " Dry mulberry - trees , old cypresses, trembling in its chill . There are nine Baby phoenixes , outcrying one another ; "
sentences.cn: 枯桑老柏寒飕 飗,九 雏鸣 凤乱啾啾.

sentences.en: A mulberry leaf touched with the genius of man becomes silk.
sentences.cn: 桑叶在天才的手中变成了丝绸.

sentences.en: All around the mulberry bush, monkey chased the weasel.
sentences.cn: 围绕着桑树丛, 猴子追赶着黄鼠狼.

sentences.en: Behind the row of mulberry trees were paddy fields.
sentences.cn: 那一片桑树背后就是稻田.

sentences.en: He saw roses winding about the rain spout; or mulberries - birds gorging in the mulberry tree.
sentences.cn: 他会看到玫瑰花绕在水管上, 或者是看到在桑树枝头上使劲啄食的小鸟.

sentences.en: In another couple of years they'll even be wanting foreign mulberry trees!
sentences.cn: 过几年他们连桑叶都要洋种了!

sentences.en: Mr. fruit of mulberry Divided into black and white two can eat.
sentences.cn: 桑椹分为黑、白两种,均可食用.

sentences.en: Mulberry red pigment hence was a good kind of natural radical scavenger.
sentences.cn: 桑椹红色素是一种很好的天然自由基清除剂.

sentences.en: Objective To study the antibacterial effect of fresh mulberry FML in vitro.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨鲜桑叶的体外抑菌作用.

sentences.en: Silkworms are fed mulberry leaves after they have hatched.
Silkworms feed on the leaves of mulberry.
Silkworms, if they eat mulberry leaves, put out white silk.
sentences.cn: 那个蚕要吃桑叶吐出来的丝是白的.

sentences.en: The aroma displays intense, ripe mulberry fruit with sweet spicy notes.
sentences.cn: 呈现了强烈的成熟浆果的味道, 香甜而微辣.

sentences.en: The lovely Lo Fo of the western land Plucks mulberry leaves by the waterside.
sentences.cn: 秦地罗敷女,采桑绿水边.

sentences.en: The spurting blood turned the white mulberry tree into a dark purple.
sentences.cn: 那飞溅的鲜血把那棵白桑树也染成了深紫色.

words.tran_cn: 毛蕊花属；毛蕊花属的植物
[蚕]桑树；[植][中医]桑椹；深紫红色

trans.tran_en: a dark purple fruit that can be eaten, or the tree on which this fruit grows
